description: This file defines the DiscoveryDelegate class within the WPEFramework namespace. It provides methods to interact with the FbDiscovery service, including media event reporting, content access, watch next, watched status updates, and entitlements account linking. The class uses external utilities like DelegateUtils and handles JSON serialization/deserialization to communicate with the external service.

classes.name: DiscoveryDelegate
classes.description: A class providing interfaces to communicate with the FbDiscovery service for media events, content access, and user entitlement management. It encapsulates JSON processing and remote procedure calls via an acquired link.

methods.name: uint32_t MediaEventAccountLink(const std::string & appId,const std::string & payload,std::string & result)
methods.description: Handles media event routing to FbDiscovery service, invoking either 'watchNext' or 'watched' RPC based on event completion status.

methods.name: uint32_t ContentAccess(const std::string & appId,const std::string & idsPayload,std::string & result)
methods.description: Normalizes and forwards content access requests with entitlement and availability data to FbDiscovery.

methods.name: uint32_t WatchNext(const std::string & appId,const std::string & contentId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Requests the 'watchNext' action on a specific content ID via FbDiscovery.

methods.name: uint32_t Watched(const std::string & appId,const std::string & entityId,const double progress,const bool completed,const std::string & watchedOn,std::string & result)
methods.description: Reports watched progress or completion status for a media entity to FbDiscovery.

methods.name: uint32_t SignIn(const std::string & appId,const std::string & entitlements,bool & success)
methods.description: Performs sign-in action with entitlements, invoking the 'signIn' RPC.

methods.name: uint32_t SignOut(const std::string & appId,bool & success)
methods.description: Performs sign-out action via the 'signOut' RPC.

methods.name: uint32_t EntitlementsAccountLink(const std::string & appId,const std::string & payload,std::string & result)
methods.description: Handles account link actions, specifically sign-in and sign-out, based on payload content.

methods.name: void NormalizeDateField(JsonObject & obj,const char * oldKey,const char * newKey)
